parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of power while driving at high speeds can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, increasing the risk of accidents and potentially leading to serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: similar to turning off the ignition switch and then turning it back on
resulting in a few seconds of total loss of control before normal operation resumes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the speedometer can cause the driver to lose awareness of their speed, leading to potential accidents or traffic violations.
symptoms: The speedometer drops to a low reading (e.g.
5 mph) and remains there for an extended period
then suddenly returns to normal operation; the issue may be accompanied by a check engine light.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of trailer lights can reduce visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, especially at night or in low-light conditions.
symptoms: potentially due to damage to the SAM chassis.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The power train problems can cause the vehicle to be hard to control on the road, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle is hard to control

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The fuel system failure can cause the engine to miss, hesitate, or stall, leading to loss of control or accidents.
The failure of the clutch hydraulic system can cause the engine to stall, prevent shifting gears, and lead to loss of control.
symptoms: releasing the Jake (engine compress brake) to get the vehicle to shift.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The brake system failure can cause the vehicle to brake incorrectly, leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Loud metal knocking noise from the front driver-side brake chamber

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Oil leaks can cause damage to the engine and other components, leading to costly repairs and potential safety hazards.
symptoms: Oil leaks from the fuel rail
oil leaks from the air compressor.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Sudden Engine Shut-Off and Loss of Power
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden loss of engine power can cause the vehicle to stall or shut off without warning, leading to a loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The engine shuts off without warning
the digital voltage gauge drops suddenly
the vehicle stalls or dies while in motion
the driver experiences a loss of control
the vehicle may veer off the road or crash.
